goal_name: An inclusive and equitable quality education system with life-long learning for all
target_name: Formalise early childhood education and life-long learning opportunities within the education system
indicator_name: Percentage of students meeting literacy and numeracy standards
GoalDescription: An inclusive and equitable quality education system with life-long learning for all
PolicyObjectiveDescription: Formalise early childhood education and life-long learning opportunities within the education system
IndicatorDescription: Percentage of students meeting literacy and numeracy standards
Calculation/Formulation: Proportion Meeting + Proportion Exceeding year 4 literacy standard, anglo.
Definition: Proportion of students meeting or exceeding year 4 litracy standard, anglo.
PreferredDataSource: Statistical Digest Report, Ministry of Education and Training.
source_organisation_1: 2016 - 2018  Annual Statistical Digest - MoE (Meeting and Exceeding Standard)
graph_title: Percentage of students meeting literacy and numeracy standards
